name: My Little Office
description:
"My Little Office" is my submission for the Virtual Pet Jam. 

The goal of the Jam was to "Make a virtual pet -- something interactive that involves simulating being the guardian of some manner of being, real or imagined -- and submit it by the deadline!" With an additional requirement of having the theme of the game be IN THE ZONE!. 

My Little Office has the player maintain a small office, starting with five employees (One in each department). Each department has Morale, Productivity, and Income. As each department earns money, their morale will slowly decrease, and it is the player's job as the business owner to do things to prevent low Morale.  If a department has no morale, then no money can be made. The Office is "In The Zone" when morale is high and everyone is making money. 

One challenge I had was giving this little office personality, so to do this - each employee can have random events happen. These events can be Good or Bad, it just depends on how the Employee wants to be. Each employee also has their own personality, hobbies, and interests. So if you notice an employee who is Angry or Happy, tap them to see what's going on during their day. You can also tap on employees to learn a little more about who they are.

This was an extremely fun Jam to take part in, and I hope everyone enjoys this submission. Thanks so much for your interest, and time!
